articles.description: EMMANUEL MACRON has been brutally torn apart by his closest French political rivals who have lashed out at his 'arrogant lectures' as the European Union continues to see the UK surge ahead with its Covid vaccine programme.

articles.author: Jack Elsom
articles.content:
Hopes for summer foreign holidays have been dealt a fresh blow after British Airways and easyJet scrapped more flights.
Would-be passengers were left dismayed by the latest round of cancellations - … [+18414 chars]
articles.description: Would-be passengers  were left dismayed by the latest round of cancellations - that included trips booked for after May 17, when breaks abroad were scheduled to resume.
articles.title: Summer holidays at risk: BA axes flights amid fears ALL of Europe could be added to 'red list' - Daily Mail
